includedAssets.title: Gay Witch Hunt
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael accidentally reveals Oscar's secret to the entire team, while Jim settles into life at the Stamford office.

includedAssets.title: Grief Counseling
includedAssets.synopsis: There's a double helping of grief in store for the office staff as Michael announces the death of both his old boss and a small bird.

includedAssets.title: Initiation
includedAssets.synopsis: Dwight puts Ryan through an unconventional sales initiation out on his family beet farm. Meanwhile, Jan asks Pam to record Michael's activities.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: There are big changes in store for the Scranton team as some new faces arrive and old friends return in this third season of the acclaimed US version of the multi-award-winning British comedy.
